name: ROBO Rusher
description:
Submission for Secret Santa Game Jam 2021.

A 2D platformer-shooter bullet-hell, about defeating a secret past robotic civilization. Credits:

All code and audio was created by me.

Controller Icon Pack:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/controller-icon-pack-128505

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/platformer-set-150023

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/robot-shooting-game-sprite...
